document_data.name: V'kandress
document_data.mainbody: '''V'kandress''' was a mysterious [[dragonborn]] follower of [[Tiamat]] and a member of [[Clan Vkriss]] in [[1479 DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|8}}
document_data.History: Little was known about V'kandress. Many believed he or she was either a [[priest]] of Tiamat or an [[Fiend patron|infernal pact]] [[warlock]], or an [[assassin]], or all the three things at the same time. V'kandress was also rumored to be the leader of the [[Knights of the Five-Thorned Rose]] in the late years of the 15th century [[DR]].
